/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different colors are scattered across the street, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sun shines brightly, casting light on the scene and enhancing the colors.
